# orion-toggle-group

Toggle group is a component that controls layout of a group of toggles.

Additional documentation available at [orion.united.com](https://orion.united.com/)

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description                             | Type      | Default |
| ---------- | ---------- | --------------------------------------- | --------- | ------- |
| `disabled` | `disabled` | Disable all toggles in group            | `boolean` | `false` |
| `inline`   | `inline`   | The inline state of the toggle group    | `boolean` | `false` |
| `justify`  | `justify`  | Justify the content of the toggle group | `boolean` | `false` |


## CSS Custom Properties

| Name                              | Description                                                                                                  |
| --------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ |
| `--orion-toggle-group-column-gap` | value of the column-gap property. Default is 56px. Inline group only displays for desktop (769px and above). |
